original_text: And unto Abiathar the priest said the king, Get thee to Anathoth, unto thine own fields; for thou art worthy of death: but I will not at this time put thee to death, because thou barest the ark of the Lord God before David my father, and because thou hast been afflicted in all wherein my father was afflicted.
korean_text: 왕이 제사장 아비아달에게 이르되 네 고향 아나돗으로 가라 너는 마땅히 죽을 자이로되 네가 내 아버지 다윗 앞에서 주 여호와의 궤를 메었고 또 내 아버지가 모든 환난을 받을 때에 너도 환난을 받았은즉 내가 오늘 너를 죽이지 아니하노라 하고

sentences.original_text: And unto Abiathar the priest said the king
for thou art worthy of death
but I will not at this time put thee to death
because thou barest the ark of the Lord God
and because thou hast been afflicted
in all wherein my father was afflicted
sentences.korean_translation: 내 아버지가 고난을 받던 모든 일에
